blog.name: lumos-dolphin
blog.title: Lumos Dolphin
blog.description: Avoiding social interaction like I avoid my responsibilities. May Thanos spare ye all.

summary: 1st update
title: 1st update
body:
How am I doing? Still trying to repair my poor soul after watching dear evan hansen (online).

How was it? Great. Music is absolutely brilliant as well as the actors, Storyline is phenomenal. Would definitely recommend.

Are you still crying over musicals? Yes. I always do. Hamilton was the only one I haven’t shed a multitude of tears at.

Best song? Too hard to pick. I should say it would be You will be Found or Sincerely, Me.

Which fandoms are you in? Potter, Marvel, DC TV shows, PJO, Hamilton, Dear Evan Hansen, Be More Chill, Divergent, LOTR, Hunger Games, Narnia, Miraculous Ladybug.

blog.name: ivannatany4
blog.title: Something by ivannatany4
blog.description:
Просто солянка из моих разных пикч, мыслей и комментариев. Кушайте, не стесняйтесь. Стараюсь пилить по возможности оригинальный контент. Люблю видеоигры, кинцо, аниме, мемчики. Иногда создаю поделки.

Just a mix out of my various pics, ideas and commentaries. Enjoy. Usually try to make original content. I like videogames, movies, anime, memes. Sometimes create handmade stuff.

summary: This is my favourite one. The two pics separately look nice, like he’s upset for the first moment and then comes up with an evil...
caption: This is my favourite one. The two pics separately look nice, like he’s upset for the first moment and then comes up with an evil plan. “Holy crap, my friends say dat I’m the worst student this year and can’t cast spells properly… Let’s see what they say when I cast engorgio on their asses tonight lol”

summary:
Slytherin: Do you want me to pick you up some food?
Ravenclaw: Nah. I’m good. I’m about to make some pasta. 
Slytherin: Do you...
body:
Slytherin: Do you want me to pick you up some food?

Ravenclaw: Nah. I’m good. I’m about to make some pasta.

Slytherin: Do you think you can handle it?

Ravenclaw: For god’s sakes. You set the microwave on fire one time reheating leftovers and suddenly you can’t ever live it down.

Gryffindor: That’s not such a big deal. I did that once when I was five.

Slytherin: Ravenclaw did it two days ago.

Ravenclaw: Fine. So I’ll never be someone’s beautifully domestic housewife because there is a high probability I might accidentally burn the house down. So what?

Gryffindor: I’m pretty good at cooking. I could be your domestic house husband.

Ravenclaw: *blushes*

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: queenofthyme
blog.title: 🌈 Queen of Thyme 💛
blog.description: my posts ll my asks ll my ao3 ll #3 #word #prompts ll Header by Chibaken 💛

summary: how to render draco malfoy speechless
body:
how to render draco malfoy speechless

the first conversation

Draco: Potter, you do realise this is the Slytherin dormitory, right?

Harry: Oh, I was wondering why the library was so damp and gloomy all of a sudden.

Draco: Hilarious. What do you want?

Harry: You- I mean, to talk to you.

Draco: Ah, of course. Here to gloat? What shall we cover? Disgraced family, the Manor lost, not a galleon to my name? Back at Hogwarts stripped of privileges, no friends and avoided by everyone else like the muggle plague? I’m sure you can’t wait to rub my face in it.

Harry: No, actually I-

Draco: You want to duel? Bring me to my knees? Slice me open again? Go on then, Potter. No one would stop you.

Harry: That’s not-

Draco: Then what, Potter? What could you possibly have to say to me after everything I’ve done?

Harry: I- I just wanted to see if you were okay.

Draco:

blog.name: queenofthyme
blog.title: 🌈 Queen of Thyme 💛
blog.description: my posts ll my asks ll my ao3 ll #3 #word #prompts ll Header by Chibaken 💛

summary: how to render draco malfoy speechless
body:
how to render draco malfoy speechless

the first kiss

Draco: Ginny told me you were rubbish.

Harry: Since when are you sharing secrets with Ginny?

Draco: Since you keep forcing your friends on me. I might as well get a little gossip out of it.

Harry: And my kissing technique was brought up how?

Draco: Ginny, obviously. She can’t stop talking about you. Potter this, Potter that. It’s insufferable.

Harry: Ginny isn’t the one who calls me Potter.

Draco: You know what I meant. I can’t help it if she keeps talking about you. It’s not like I want to know what your mouth tastes like. Or how often you use tongue. Or where you like to grab-

Harry: If you can manage to shut up for just one second, I’ll show you.

Draco:

title: Christmas 1995 - nightswatch - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling

Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black

Series: Part 6 of A Series of Christmases
Summary:

Remus returns to Grimmauld Place for Christmas and finds that there is yet another, rather unexpected undercover mission that he needs to go on.
